name: InterviewMate

offers.description: Pay-as-you-go credits for real-time interview assistance

description: Real-time AI interview assistant that listens to interview questions during live video calls and instantly suggests personalized answers. Works on Zoom, Teams, Google Meet with <1 second latency using Deepgram Flux and Claude 3.5 Sonnet.
features: Real-time speech-to-text with Deepgram Flux (<500ms latency)
AI-powered answer generation with Claude 3.5 Sonnet
Personalized responses based on your resume and experience
Works during live video interviews on Zoom, Teams, Google Meet
RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) for personalized answers
releaseNotes: Real-time interview coaching with sub-second latency. Deepgram Flux integration for faster transcription. Async architecture eliminates timeout issues.
keywords: interview assistant, real-time coaching, AI interview help, Zoom interview tool, video interview assistant, behavioral interview prep, STAR method, interview answers, live interview help, technical interview preparation
